| summarize by database_name_s","value":"wordpress","typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[]},"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"パラメーター - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let C1 = basic_resource_CL
| where server_name_s == '{serverName}' and database_name_s == '{databaseName}'
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project key = 1, Title = 'Edition', Value = Edition_s
| take 1;
let C2 = basic_resource_CL
| where server_name_s == '{serverName}' and database_name_s == '{databaseName}'
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project key = 2, Title = 'Version',Value = ResourceVersion_s
| take 1;
let C3 = basic_resource_CL
| where server_name_s == '{serverName}' and database_name_s == '{databaseName}'
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project key = 3, Title = 'CPU Count',Value = tostring(toint(cpu_count_d))
| take 1;
let C4 = basic_resource_CL
| where server_name_s == '{serverName}' and database_name_s == '{databaseName}'
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project key = 4, Title = 'Max Worker Count',Value = tostring(toint(max_workers_count_d))
| take 1;
let C5 = basic_resource_CL
| where server_name_s == '{serverName}' and database_name_s == '{databaseName}'
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project key = 5, Title = 'Visible Memory MB',Value = tostring(toint(visible_target_MB_d))
| take 1;
let C6 = basic_resource_CL
| where server_name_s == '{serverName}' and database_name_s == '{databaseName}'
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project key = 6, Title = 'Start Time',Value = tostring(format_datetime(sqlserver_start_time_t,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'))
| take 1;
C1
| union  C2, C3, C4, C5, C6
